title: A1534 no power
message:
Hello,

I have an A1534 820-00045-A board, with no liquid dameges, that pulls 19.5 V from power supply, but consumes only 0.35A.

PPBUS_G3H is ok 8.5V, but PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3H has 20V (i think that it should be 8.5V also).

Can you help? What should i check from here?

title: A1534 no power
message:
The Apple note from page 60 confused you.
There will not be used 35V filter caps, for 8.5V nominal voltage.

I do not recommend to waste time with this kind of boards, all end with dead CPU.
If you still want to continue, then post some basic voltages and signals from power on sequence.

title: A1534 no power
message:
Thanks!

The CPU gets very hot, so i think that it has some kind of working.

Here are some readings. Does it tell you something?

PPBUS_G3H = 8.5
PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3H = 20V
PPBUS_S5_HS_COMPUTING_ISNS = 8.5 V
PPVBUS_E85 = 20V
PPDCIN_G3H = 20V
PP3V3_G3H = 3.3V
PP3V3R3V0_AON = 3.2V
PPVRTC_G3H = 3.2V
PP5V_G3H_LDO = 4.9V
PP5V_S0SW_LCD = 0V
PP5V_S4 = 4.9V
PP5V_S0 = 4.9V
PP3V3_S5 = 3.2V
PP3V3_SUS = 3.2V
PP3V3_S4 = 3.2V
PP1V8_S3 = 1.7V
PP1V5_S0 = 0V
PP1V2_S3 = 1.1V
PP1V05_SUS = 1V
PP1V05_S4SW = 0V
PP5V1_S4SW = 0V
PPVCC_S0_CPU = 1.5V

title: A1534 no power
message:
"PP1V5_S0 = 0V"
Check diode mode to ground.

title: A1534 no power
message:
Diode mode is OK.. 0.362V
ohm = 7.8K

title: A1534 no power
message:
Sorry, probably i mesured it wrong at first...
Now PP1V5_S0 = 1.5V

title: A1534 no power
message:
Bad CPU probably.
Do you get USB activity at least?

title: A1534 no power
message: Yes, i do have USB activity, and now  i conected it (just the board alone) to one USB-C hub and it seans that it has some kind of activity, because the external monitor recognizes something conected, and it shows some strange lines in the external display (like some grafics artefacts)

title: A1534 no power
message:
Reflow entire board and see if that helps.
Do not expect too much from this board...

title: A1534 no power
message: OK, thanks. I'll do that.

title: A1534 no power
message:
The reflow seams to have worked (lets see for how long ;-).

Thank you very much!

title: A1534 no power
message:
Hello,
Although the laptop already works, we reintaled OSX but the laptop is extremely slow. 
Is there any procedure already known that we should perform? Could it be a missing /bad component on the board? 
I think that this processor has Turbo Bust, and that may be what is not being activated. Do you have any idea?

title: A1534 no power
message:
Was it slow before reinstalling too?
Run HWMonitor and look for strange values.

title: A1534 no power
message:
Yes, it was very slow. that's why we reinstaled it.
In hwmonitor, we can't notice anything with any bottleneck. I run the Intel CPU test, and it shows that the CPU dosen't pass 1 Ghz (top) and is on average below 700 Mhz.

title: A1534 no power
message:
No strange temps?
Try known good trackpad board/flex.

title: A1534 no power
message:
Hi,

I have exact same board and exact same measurments like hgoncalves. With battery and usb-c plug it drains about 0,4A and 15V. Board is getting hot in the cpu area. My question is now (nothing to loose) what does ist mean reflow the entire board? Really the entire board or only the cpu area?

title: A1534 no power
message:
"reflow the entire board?"
Heat entire board into IR oven.

HWMonitor shows good voltage and current readings?
Check if AVREF_SMC is correct.

title: A1534 no power
message: Should I use flux or without flux?

title: A1534 no power
message:
Use flux only if suspect corrosion under BGA chips.
Quality flux and in small amount.

title: A1534 no power
message: This is no water damage. From one day to other doesn‘t power on

title: A1534 no power
message: Today reflowed the half board around the CPU area and it seems to work actually!

title: A1534 no power
message:
Save data, if important.
It will not last too much...

title: A1534 no power
message: Do you have an idea where can I buy all schematics in a package for all iPhone, iPad and MacBook? Some weeks ago I found a site where this was possible but cannot find it now.

title: A1534 no power
message:
You can find and download individual schematics.
Who offers some packs, will make you pay for something you can find for free on Internet; just need patience.
The pack will not include ALL for sure...

title: A1534 no power
message: I‘m searching for an ipad air 2 board file, cannot find it. Only found the normal pdf file
